hw1

Class Stats

  • java.lang.Object
    • hw1.Stats

  • public class Stats
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that implements a simple statistic tracking array
    Since:
    2017-01-09
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    jingyi tay

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Stats()
      creates an empty array
      Stats(int first, int second, int third)
      Creates an array with specified values for JUnit testers

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int averageGames(int choice) 
      int getTotalGames()
      Calculates the number of games played
      void incrementComputerWins()
      Increases the count of the number of games computer wins
      void incrementTies()
      Increases the count of the number of games that are tied
      void incrementUserWins()
      Increases the count of the number of games user wins
      void printStats()
      prints the percentage of games won by user and computer and the percentage of games tied
      void reset()
      resets the percentage of games won by the user and computer and the percentage of games tied
      void resetWrong()
      creates an incorrect reset method

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Stats

        public Stats()
        creates an empty array

      • Stats

        public Stats(int first,
     int second,
     int third)
        Creates an array with specified values for JUnit testers
        Parameters:
        first: - assigned to the first cell
        second: - assigned to the second cell
        third: - assigned to the third cell

    • Method Detail

      • getTotalGames

        public int getTotalGames()
        Calculates the number of games played
        Returns:
        The total number of played games

      • incrementUserWins

        public void incrementUserWins()
        Increases the count of the number of games user wins

      • incrementComputerWins

        public void incrementComputerWins()
        Increases the count of the number of games computer wins

      • incrementTies

        public void incrementTies()
        Increases the count of the number of games that are tied

      • averageGames

        public int averageGames(int choice)
        Parameters:
        choice: - depending on the value of choice the corresponding average (percent) is returned: if choice is 0, return the average for a user if choice is 1, return the average for a computer if choice is 2, return the average for ties otherwise return -1
        Returns:
        percentage of won games or ties, depending on the parameter choice.

      • printStats

        public void printStats()
        prints the percentage of games won by user and computer and the percentage of games tied

      • reset

        public void reset()
        resets the percentage of games won by the user and computer and the percentage of games tied

      • resetWrong

        public void resetWrong()
        creates an incorrect reset method
